name: Lifestyle Package
details: LIFESTYLE PACKAGE is my widest range of coverage.It includes family,seniors,couples,in home,newborn,and birth.Mini sessions may br available for a lesser cost depending on what tyoe of session you are wanting.

name: Silver Weeding Package
details: SILVER WEEDING PACKAGE covers single day weeding photoshot.Approximately 70 high quality edited photos,duration upto 2 hours,pre-weeding consultation,files provided direct to you online or Via USB.

name: Gold Weeding Package
details: Gold WEEDING PACKAGE covers double day weeding photoshot.Approximately 225-300 high quality edited photos, duration up to 8 hours, online photo album, files provided direct to you online or via USB.

name: Platinum Weeding Package
details: PLATINUM WEEDING PACKAGE covers TRIPLE day weeding photoshot.Approximately 325-400 high quality edited photos, full day coverage up to 10 hour, online photo album  , 3 photos provided within 48 hours, files provided direct to you online or via USB.

name: Budget Friendly Package
details: Basically BUDGET FRIENDLY PACKAGE offers for students.This package covers the events like Class ending ceremony,graduation day and cultural programs for any educational institution.Before purchasing this service,you must be verified as a student.

name: Pet Photography Package
details: PET PHOTOGRAPHY PACKAGE offers to capture some moments with your pet.You will receive 4 fully edited images.Online Gallery to choose your images.Your pet must be house trained and be able to follow basic commands like SIT,STAY,LIE DOWN etc.
